com.flowpowered.persistence.config

Class ConfigurationWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.persistence.config.ConfigurationWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configuration, ConfigurationNodeSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnnotatedConfiguration, ConfigurationHolderConfiguration

    public abstract class ConfigurationWrapper
extends Object
implements Configuration
    A parent class for implementations of Configuration that wrap other Configurations.

      • splitNodePath

        public String[] splitNodePath(String path)
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Split the provided path into a string array suitable for accessing the correct configuration children. Normally this just splits the path with the Configuration.getPathSeparator(), but can limit how deep a child path can go or whether this configuration can even have children.
        Specified by:
        splitNodePath in interface Configuration
        Parameters:
        path - The path to split
        Returns:
        The connectly split path.

      • ensureCorrectPath

        public String[] ensureCorrectPath(String[] rawPath)
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Make sure the provided path meets the requirements. A correct implementation of Configuration will impose the same restrictions on this and Configuration.splitNodePath(String), so invoking this method on an array from Configuration.splitNodePath(String) would return the original array.
        Specified by:
        ensureCorrectPath in interface Configuration
        Parameters:
        rawPath - The raw path of the configuration
        Returns:
        The corrected input path

      • getChild

        public ConfigurationNode getChild(String name)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationNodeSource
        Gets a child of the current node. Remember that this returns a DIRECT child, without splitting at the Configuration.getPathSeparator()
        Specified by:
        getChild in interface ConfigurationNodeSource
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the child
        Returns:
        The ConfigurationNode with the child's path.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • getKeys

        public Set<String> getKeys(boolean deep)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationNodeSource
        Return the keys in this configuration. If deep is true, this will also include paths from child nodes, joined by Configuration.getPathSeparator() Keys returned are relative to the current node.
        Specified by:
        getKeys in interface ConfigurationNodeSource
        Parameters:
        deep - Whether to also fetch keys in children nodes of this configuration
        Returns:
        the keys in this configuration

      • getNode

        public ConfigurationNode getNode(String path)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationNodeSource
        Returns the node at the specified child path, splitting by the configuration's path separator. This can return both direct children and indirect children.
        Specified by:
        getNode in interface ConfigurationNodeSource
        Parameters:
        path - The path to get a node at
        Returns:
        The node at the specified path
        See Also:
        for more information on how this method behaves. (This is also the method called when a path given contains the path separator)

      • getNode

        public ConfigurationNode getNode(String... path)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationNodeSource
        Get a child node of this node source, going across multiple levels. If there is no node at the specified path a detached configuration node will be returned, which will be attached to ConfigurationNodeSource.getConfiguration() if its value is set or a child is added.
        Specified by:
        getNode in interface ConfigurationNodeSource
        Parameters:
        path - The path elements to get to the requested node.
        Returns:
        The child node. Never null.

      • hasChildren

        public boolean hasChildren()
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationNodeSource
        Returns whether this node source has children. This is the same as running getChildren().size() > 0
        Specified by:
        hasChildren in interface ConfigurationNodeSource
        Returns:
        whether this node source has children

        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationNodeSource
